entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: mayurpawar17/Lumen: Lumen Note is a lightweight web app designed for quick and efficient note-taking. It features a simple and clean user interface, allowing users to easily add, delete, and search notes. The app uses a backend database to store and manage notes securely, ensuring fast access and persistence across sessions.
entry.content: Lumen Note is a lightweight web app designed for quick and efficient note-taking. It features a simple and clean user interface, allowing users to easily add, delete, and search notes. The app uses a backend database to store and manage notes securely, ensuring fast access and persistence across sessions.
